content:
Site update: I now secure all content on here with [SSL](http://ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=barryfrost.com), including the admin/posting interface. 

Unless I've missed any hard-coded URLs, everything should be served via *https* meaning there's a little green lock icon in your address bar (depending on your browser).

I've also been dabbling with [Micropub](http://indiewebcamp.com/micropub) to support external posting from tools like [Quill](http://quill.p3k.io/). More on that later.
